sentences.en: " You're a coward and a pup.
sentences.cn: “ 你是个胆小鬼,是个狗崽子.

sentences.en: A pedigree pup should have been inoculated against serious diseases before it's sold.
sentences.cn: 纯种狗应该在出售前注射预防严重疾病的针.

sentences.en: And that goddamn pup tent smells like cat piss or worse.
sentences.cn: 那个该死的小帐篷就跟猫尿一样臭,比猫尿还臭.

sentences.en: Aunt Sharon pup her photo in the photo frame.
sentences.cn: 莎伦婶婶把她提照片放进相框里.

sentences.en: But you're just pup. Come back when you become a dog.
sentences.cn: 可你还只是只小狗,长大以后再来吧.

sentences.en: DJ is only a pup, but he clearly shows the classical markings.
sentences.cn: 虽然DJ还只是一只幼犬, 但它清楚地显示出了边境牧羊犬的典型斑纹.

sentences.en: He stalked over to the pup tent of the recreation tent orderly and bawled him out.
sentences.cn: 他气昂昂来到管娱乐室那个勤务兵住的小帐篷里,给了他一顿熊.

sentences.en: He's had David since the pup was six days old.
sentences.cn: 他从[大卫]还是一只6天大的小狗时就开始养它.

sentences.en: I'll get you an Alsatian pup for Christmas.
sentences.cn: 我会送你一只阿尔萨斯小狗作为圣诞节礼物。

sentences.en: If something's wrong with the bitch , then something's wrong with the pup.
sentences.cn: 每次都先是母狗遗传的.

sentences.en: The men cast off their packs, withdrew their ponchos and set up their pup tents again.
sentences.cn: 大家扔下了背包,取出了雨披, 把小帐篷重又架了起来.

sentences.en: The pup had climbed onto my lap and settled in.
sentences.cn: 小狗爬上我的腿,趴了下来.

sentences.en: The pup was in a fix when he walked into the mudhole.
sentences.cn: 小狗跌进泥坑便爬不出来了.

sentences.en: The sleepy pup 24 tilted his head and chuffed a welcome.
sentences.cn: 昏昏欲睡的小狗斜着头,呜呜地叫着表示欢迎.

sentences.en: You've been sold a pup -- that house is nearly falling down!
sentences.cn: 你上当了 -- 那所房子都要塌了!

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)（尤指通过出售无用的东西来）诈骗；（因购买无用的东西而）受骗

trans.tran_cn: 小狗，自负的傻小子，（小狐，小海豹等）幼小的动物，〈俚〉学生
